name: Bollywood Star Priyanka Chopra Dress Up Game
name_original: Bollywood Star Priyanka Chopra Dress Up Game
description: Bollywood star Priyanka Chopra is an International actress, singer, model, film producer, philanthropist, and the winner of Miss World 2000. She chooses a dress for the party she will go to at night. Can you help her get dressed? Their dresses, jewelry and shoes should be very stylish.
